Reason: The 'commitlog_sync' configuration option is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'DatabaseDescriptor.getCommitLogSync()' method is used to determine the type of commit log service to be used, which directly impacts the performance of the system. Depending on the chosen sync type (periodic, batch, or group), different commit log service implementations are used, each with its own performance characteristics. This configuration directly affects the execution time and memory consumption of the system, leading to notable performance variations at the system level.
